Text: Yeah, I know, I'm not Riddler A, but what the hell !!!
After this download completed... i went to open the folder to watch them and it crashes windows explorer. No damage, it just restarts but i can not open the folder at all.  Watch out people.

For the record, all the scans are clean on my side. 
Thanks for reporting, but I don't think I can be blamed for this one. 
Try to supress the file and the torrent, then restart, do a full scan (with Kaspersky or something), then redownload. Plus there are 23 files, how come you can't even open the regular file they're into? Maybe your torrent client is amiss or something. 
I've doublechecked, and normally, everything should work fine.
Crashed Windows Explorer?!  Is that a complaint, or a 'thank you'?

LOL@mmedic

Implying that windows explorer and internet explorer are the same thing? Because they aren't..
